mapper.select:
select ps.progress_id, ps.child_name, ps.pay_status, l.state, s.name, pm.title, l.start_date, l.end_date, l.expire_end_date, l.place, l.fee, l.lesson_length, l.lesson_time
from tbl_progress as ps
left join tbl_lesson as l on ps.lesson_id = l.lesson_id
left join tbl_program as pm on l.program_id = pm.program_id
left join tbl_sub_category as s on pm.sub_category_id = pm.sub_category_id
where ps.parent_id = #{id} and ps.deletedAt is null
group by ps.progress_id

select count(ps.progress_id)
from tbl_progress as ps
left join tbl_parent as p on ps.parent_id = p.parent_id
where ps.parent_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_progress( parent_id, lesson_id, child_name, pay_status ) values ( #{parentId}, #{lessonId}, #{childName}, 'pending' )
mapper.update: update tbl_progress set pay_status = 'success' where progress_id = ${progressId}
